医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示中国男性对60种与饮酒相关疾病的易感性近日，北京大学和牛津人口健康中心的研究人员进行的一项研究揭示了中国男性对60种与饮酒有关的疾病的易感性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Study-sheds-light-on-the-susceptibility-of-Chinese-men-to-60-diseases-lated-to-alcohol-conspiration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Study-sheds-light-on-the-susceptibility-of-Chinese-men-to-60-diseases-lated-to-alcohol-conspiration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=140d2826-f9a1-4176-bb1b-4409d7b143af Tue, 25 Jul 2023 17:50:38 -0400 Study sheds light on the susceptibility of Chinese men to 60 diseases related to alcohol consumption
新的计算工具可以促进大流行病的防范免疫系统研究人员设计了一种计算工具来加强对大流行病的防范。科学家可以使用这种新算法来比较来自截然不同的实验的数据，并更好地预测个体对疾病的反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/New-computational-tool-could-boost-pandemic-preparedness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/New-computational-tool-could-boost-pandemic-preparedness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=520164ff-0978-4b54-a3d4-4ef7cc75c8b5 Tue, 25 Jul 2023 17:39:41 -0400 New computational tool could boost pandemic preparedness
新技术改善大鼠骨再生尽管骨骼具有自我再生和修复的能力，但当损伤大于小骨折或碎裂时，它们通常无法做到这一点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/New-technique-improves-bone-regenesis-in-rats.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/New-technique-improves-bone-regenesis-in-rats.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f87e70f5-4995-46d4-a5dd-366f2dda3acb Tue, 25 Jul 2023 17:32:54 -0400 New technique improves bone regeneration in rats
生命早期食物过敏与哮喘风险增加和肺部生长减缓相关一项世界首项研究表明，婴儿时期的食物过敏与儿童时期的哮喘和肺功能下降有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Early-life-food-allergy-linked-with-increased-risk-of-asthma-and-reduced-lung-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Early-life-food-allergy-linked-with-increased-risk-of-asthma-and-reduced-lung-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=384dc3a5-2767-487d-bc91-c55216888968 Tue, 25 Jul 2023 17:23:51 -0400 Early life food allergy associated with increased risk of asthma and reduced lung growth
精神病患者的去机构化需要明确的领导和长期的承诺分析显示，旨在在社区而不是医院治疗精神病患者的重大变革需要明确而强有力的领导，以及长期的政治和财政承诺。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Deinstitutionalization-of-psychiatric-患者-requires-clear-leadership-long-term-commitment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Deinstitutionalization-of-psychiatric-患者-requires-clear-leadership-long-term-commitment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=24f79f6c-4a83-415c-975f-d614c78665a5 Tue, 25 Jul 2023 17:13:03 -0400 Deinstitutionalization of psychiatric patients requires clear leadership, long-term commitment
人工智能可以通过低剂量 CT 扫描改善死亡风险预测北美放射学会 (RSNA) 杂志《放射学》上发表的一项研究表明，人工智能 (AI) 可以利用肺部低剂量 CT 扫描数据来改善肺癌、心血管疾病和其他原因死亡的风险预测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/AI-can-improve-risk-prediction-for-death-with-low-dose-CT-scans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/AI-can-improve-risk-prediction-for-death-with-low-dose-CT-scans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c72982ae-1ee6-46fa-b948-bb8a6818dfa7 Tue, 25 Jul 2023 16:49:32 -0400 AI can improve risk prediction for death with low-dose CT scans
UVA研究人员发现了加速衰老的慢性炎症的关键驱动因素弗吉尼亚大学医学院的研究人员发现了加速衰老的慢性炎症的关键驱动因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/UVA-researchers-discover-key-driver-of-chronic-inflammation-that-accelerates-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/UVA-researchers-discover-key-driver-of-chronic-inflammation-that-accelerates-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba1bcca5-ae67-416e-a078-753f703c8e91 Tue, 25 Jul 2023 16:27:35 -0400 UVA researchers discover key driver of chronic inflammation that accelerates aging
社区卫生工作者改善圣安东尼奥居家老年患者的健康状况在 COVID-19 大流行期间，保持健康和保持联系对每个人来说都很困难，对于居家的老年患者及其护理人员来说尤其如此。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Community-health-workers-improve-health-of-homebound-older-病人-in-San-Antonio.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Community-health-workers-improve-health-of-homebound-older-病人-in-San-Antonio.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c65e670-1a25-441b-afe7-fb29fe77dd88 Tue, 25 Jul 2023 16:12:26 -0400 Community health workers improve health of homebound older patients in San Antonio
美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 拨款 300 万美元，用于调查母亲体重指数 (BMI) 与儿童肥胖之间的关系密歇根州立大学和亨利·福特健康中心的研究人员从美国国立卫生研究院下属的国家糖尿病、消化和肾脏疾病研究所获得了 300 万美元的资助，用于研究母亲体重指数 (BMI) 与儿童肥胖之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/243-million-NIH-grant-awarded-to-investigate-the-connections- Between-maternal-BMI-and-childhood-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/243-million-NIH-grant-awarded-to-investigate-the-connections- Between-maternal-BMI-and-childhood-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71142894-1bcf-4c00-95b4-0bb35c35845e Tue, 25 Jul 2023 15:37:21 -0400 $3 million NIH grant awarded to investigate the connections between maternal BMI and childhood obesity
维生素 D 水平可能在银屑病严重程度中发挥重要作用在美国，超过 800 万人患有牛皮癣，这是一种皮肤细胞堆积并形成发痒的干燥斑块的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Vitamin-D-levels-could-play-an-important-role-in-psoriasis-severity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230725/Vitamin-D-levels-could-play-an-important-role-in-psoriasis-severity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=feb03da2-d3c5-4335-893f-0e91091f314e Tue, 25 Jul 2023 15:23:11 -0400 Vitamin D levels could play an important role in psoriasis severity
